source:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is looking for someone to help make a dream come true.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のジリ・アリアポーは、祝祭の準備をしているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_01<tab>Little Ladies' Day soon approaches, but its arrival is heralded by someone most unexpected: Jihli Aliapoh, who claims to have had a dream of a goobbue on Ul'dah's grand stage. Before making this dream come true, however, she must convince the planners of Little Ladies' Day that the goobue performer she hired poses no danger to the people. The royal seneschal has traveled from Ul'dah on behalf of his peers, and Aliapoh instructs you to go to Bentbranch Meadows, where the goobue is delivering joy to all and sundry.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ジリ・アリアポーたちとグゥーブーについて話した。エッグハントの祝祭を盛り上げるため、中央森林のベントブランチ牧場にいる「アルデムンド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_02<tab>As promised, Aldemund and Peatie, his goobbue companion, are ready and eager to perform their show. After seeing the mild-mannered goobbue turn an egg into a rabbit, the royal seneschal is convinced that the pair would be right at home in Little Ladies' Day. They must finished the event in Gridania first, however, and for that Aldemund requires your aid. It seems Peatie suffers from a minor case of stage fright, and Aldemund asks that you ride on the goobbue's head to reassure her as she performs for the crowds across Gridania. Peatie stands at the ready, with no obvious signs of disagreement to the idea of having you atop her head.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_02<tab>アルデムンドと話した。ピティーは頭に人を乗せると安心するようだ。ピティーが安心して芸を披露できるよう、「アルデムンド」と話してピティーに乗せてもらおう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_03<tab>Peatie shwos no sign of discontent as you mount her head. Now, the people of Gridania await to find out the answer to the question “What's in the egg?”
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_03<tab>アルデムンドと話し、ピティーに乗せてもらった。ピティーに騎乗した状態で、ベントブランチ牧場にいる人々に「エッグミラージュ」を披露し、飾りたまごを配っていることを宣伝しよう。

※ベントブランチ牧場にいる「アルデムンド」に話しかけると「ピティー」に騎乗できます。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_04<tab>Peatie's performance is a hit across Gridania, and the spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is alive and well within the city. Aldemund is surely eager to hear of his friend's success, and perhaps requires a few helping hands to pass out what eggs remain.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_04<tab>人々にピティーの芸を披露し、飾りたまごを配っていることを宣伝した。ベントブランチ牧場にいる「アルデムンド」のところに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive to see Aldemund's supply of eggs to be empty─a true sign that Peatie's show acheived everything it set out to do. The Little Ladies' Day planners are sure to accept her now, but it comes down to the decision of the royal seneschal.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_05<tab>アルデムンドのところに戻り、飾りたまご配りが大盛況だったと聞いた。ピティーとともに、エッグハントの祝祭を成功させることができたようだ。これでプリンセスデーにピティーを呼べるだろうか……。決心した様子の執事王に声をかけて、話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_06<tab>
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_06<tab>

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Aldemund at Bentbranch Meadows.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_00<tab>ベントブランチ牧場のアルデムンドと話す

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Aldemund and mount Peatie.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_01<tab>アルデムンドと話してピティーに騎乗する

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_02<tab>Mount Peatie and show the gathered citizens what's in the egg.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_02<tab>ピティーに騎乗して集まった人々にエッグミラージュを見せる

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Aldemund.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_03<tab>アルデムンドと話す

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is come once more, and I daresay we've truly outdone ourselves this time! That is, if we can see Mistress Aliapoh's dream realized...
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>今回のエッグハントでは、特別な催し物を計画中なんですぅ～！
どうか、上手くいきますように！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_002<tab>Oh, hello. I suppose this “Hatching<var 1F /var>tide” really is as popular as Mistress Aliapoh says.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_002<tab>おや……あなたも、エッグハントを楽しみに？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Welcome, my friend. I take it the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide decorations have caught your eye?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>エグ、エグ、エグル、エッグルルルゥ～ッ♪
楽しい楽しい「エッグハント」の季節がめぐってきたよ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that really you? I had hoped I might see you again, but I did not dare assume. Nonetheless, it warms my heart to see you eager to revel in Hatching<var 1F /var>tide once more.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、久しぶりに会えて嬉しいわ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>It warms my heart that they would, for I am the host of this event─Jihli Aliapoh, at your humble service. If I'm not mistaken, you're an adventurer, yes? Might I have your name?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>私は、「エッグハント」を主催しているジリ・アリアポー！
あなた冒険者さんでしょう？
よかったら、お名前を聞かせてくれる？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...a festive name, and make no mistake. I hope that you shall find all things Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to your liking─no, I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> you shall!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab>そう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>というのね！
これから、どうぞよろしく♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_014<tab>For I have dreamt it, just as I did many moons ago, when the Twelve Archons visited me in a prophetic dream that inspired this occasion. Since that night, I have worked tirelessly to do justice to their vision.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_014<tab>それじゃあ、「エッグハント」について説明させてね！
この祝祭は、先の霊災が起きる直前に、
私が見た夢をきっかけに始まったお祭りなの！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_015<tab>This year, it was again a dream that sparked my imagination...a dream of a goobbue, massive and marvelous, standing upon the stage. And where was that stage, you ask? It might surprise you to hear that it was in Ul'dah, so many malms away!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_015<tab>実はまた不思議な夢を見たんだけど……
大きな魔物の「グゥーブー」が、ステージに立っていたのよ！
しかもその場所は……なんと、ウルダハの街中！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_016<tab>In the goobbue's hands was an egg decorated most lavishly, and she was wreathed in radiant flowers of pink.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_016<tab>グゥーブーは手に飾りたまごを持っていて、
ステージは、かわいいピンクの花で彩られていたわ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_100_017<tab>And there is but one time of year when the sandy brown of that city is accented by peach blossoms in full bloom. Yes, I speak of Little Ladies' Day!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_100_017<tab>ウルダハの街でピンクの花といえば、
それは間違いなく、プリンセスデーの祝祭……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_018<tab>The message of Mistress Aliapoh's dream was clear: celebrate Hatching<var 1F /var>tide and Little Ladies' Day in tandem, and let the strengths of each make for the most festive day that jewel of a city has seen!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_018<tab>だから、今回はプリンセスデーとエッグハントを、
「合同企画」にしようと、執事王さんに提案したんですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_019<tab>'Tis a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I see ours is not the only celebration who can boast of your selfless assistance.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_019<tab>プリンセスデーの祝祭以外で冒険者さんとお会いするとは……！
お元気そうでなによりです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_020<tab>'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have the honor of acting as this year's <var 1A 02 /var>royal<var 1A 01 /var> seneschal, and it is my duty to bring smiles and cheers to all the ladies of the realm.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_020<tab>冒険者さんとは、はじめましてですな。
私はプリンセスデーを運営し、
「執事王」を名乗っている者です！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_021<tab>What is Little Ladies' Day, you ask? Why, it is a day when the gentlemen of Eorzea assume the role of seneschals, doting upon the needs of Eorzea's fair maidens who are as princesses for the day.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_021<tab>すべての淑女が「姫」としてもてはやされ、
すべての紳士が「執事」として姫の願いを叶えるお祭り。
それが「プリンセスデー」でございます！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_022<tab>Mistress Aliapoh's proposal was quite unprecedented. And so confident was she in her vision that she had already secured the services of a performer and his goobbue companion <var 1A 02 /var>before<var 1A 01 /var> meeting with us.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_022<tab>お話をいただいて私も驚きました。
プリンセスデーでもグゥーブーを連れた旅芸人を招き、
催しに華を添えるという企画が準備されていたのですから！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_023<tab>I regret to say not all in Ul'dah were as confident. Many doubted the safety, and some the sanity, of such an act, and our planning for Little Ladies' Day has come to a halt.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_023<tab>ところが、安全性の観点から疑問の声が上がり、
プリンセスデーでは企画が頓挫してしまいましてな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_024<tab>The trepidation is not without cause, mind you. Just twenty years ago, a supposedly tame goobbue ran amok in the city streets, causing untold casualties.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_024<tab>実際、20年ほど前の話ですが、
ウルダハでは見世物のグゥーブーが暴れる事件が起きています。
そんなこともあって、本当におとなしく芸ができるのか、と……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_027<tab>When the seneschal informed us of this roadblock, I was blessed with a flash of brilliance! We would hold a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide event here in Gridania, with the goobbue as the main attraction!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_027<tab>執事王さんのお話を聞いて、思ったんですぅ～！
そういう事情なら、グゥーブーさんと旅芸人さんには、
先にエッグハントで芸を披露してもらえばいいかなって！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_028<tab>Not only would this provide a welcome cause for celebration, but it would prove that our goobbue could be safely trusted around revelers. Surely that would set the hearts of Ul'dah at ease!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_028<tab>グリダニアのみなさんもきっと喜ぶだろうし……
エッグハントでグゥーブーが評判になれば、
ウルダハの人を安心させるきっかけにもなるはずですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_029<tab>In fact, the performers I've invited have already arrived! Nonotta and I were treated to a display of their show, and I must say, never have I seen a goobbue so pretty and sweet.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_029<tab>実はもう、旅芸人さんたちも黒衣森に来ているの！
ノノッタちゃんと一緒に、グゥーブーちゃんとも会って、
芸を見せてもらったけれど、とても大人しい子だったわよ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_030<tab>I saw no harm in their suggestion─and truth be told, it was the only way forward. I came here to Gridania at once so that I could act as a witness for my peers in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_030<tab>こちらとしても、ありがたい提案でした。
私もぜひ直接、その芸を見せていただきたいとお伝えし、
こうしてグリダニアに参ったのです。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_033<tab>Since you're here, might you accompany us to the show? Someone as well-versed in this realm's monsters as you may be singularly qualified to tell us just how docile this goobbue is.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_033<tab>そこで……どうか私とともに来ていただけませんかな？
戦闘に長けた冒険者さんの目線で、
グゥーブーの安全性を確認してほしいのです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_001<tab>I expect quite a few eggs for my troubles.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_001<tab>エグ、エグ、エグル、エッグルルルゥ～ッ♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_002<tab>Well, I'd hate to see Miss Aliapoh's dream shattered...
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_002<tab>仕方ないな……

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_034<tab>Eggs...? Quite an unusual form of payment, but I believe Mistress Aliapoh has plenty...
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_034<tab>エ、エグ……？
先ほどジリさんもおっしゃっていましたが、
それはいったい、どういう意味で……？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_035<tab>Regardless, the look on your face says you agree to my proposal. Many thanks, and I look forward to what is sure to be a fascinating show!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_035<tab>いえ、そんなことより……
お顔から察するに、ご快諾いただけたようですな。
まことに感謝いたしますぞ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_036<tab>As would I! While I'm certain that there is nothing to fear, having a stout arm by my side will do much to quell any unbidden fear.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_036<tab>ありがとうございます！
どうかよろしくお願いいたしますぞ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_036<tab>Well then, all is settled. The show of a lifetime awaits at Bentbranch Meadows─you had best not tarry.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_036<tab>旅芸人の方とグゥーブーちゃんなら、
今はベントブランチ牧場で飾りたまごを配っているわ！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_037<tab>Agreed. Let us make our way there and speak with Aldemund, leader of this traveling troupe. Oh, I can hardly wait!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_037<tab>では、ベントブランチ牧場に向かって、
まずは旅芸人の「アルデムンド」さんと話をいたしましょう。
冒険者さん、私は先に行ってお待ちしております！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_040<tab>The adorable goobbue is even now delivering egg-tastic cheer to all in Bentbranch Meadows. Go there and speak with Aldemund─I'm sure he shall be most eager to show you how harmless she is.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_040<tab>グゥーブーちゃんたちなら、
今はベントブランチ牧場で飾りたまごを配っているわ！
一緒にいる旅芸人の「アルデムンド」さんに話を聞いてみて！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_041<tab>I went to visit the goobbue along with Mistress Aliapoh. I must say, I never realized just how adorable they were up close.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_041<tab>先にジリちゃんと一緒に会ってきましたが、
本当におとなしそうなグゥーブーさんですぅ～。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_042<tab>I...I don't believe I've ever been this close to one before...
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_042<tab>なるほど、こちらが噂のグゥーブーさんですか……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_043<tab>...Grrr?
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_043<tab>グゥ……？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_050<tab>Oh, and you are?
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_050<tab>おや、あなたがたは……？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_051<tab>Greetings. I am the royal seneschal, in charge of making Little Ladies' Day most memorable for all ladies of the realm. Mistress Aliapoh has informed us that you have quite the show prepared for us.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_051<tab>私は、プリンセスデーの主宰をしている執事王と申します。
先にご相談させていただいていたように、
グゥーブーさんの芸を拝見したいと思いまして……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_053<tab>Aye, that we do. You'll be hard-pressed to pick your jaw up off the floor after you see what my Peatie has in store for you.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_053<tab>ああ、話は聞いておるわい。
いくらでも見ていってくだされ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_054<tab>I've been watchin' over her ever since the day I found her wanderin' the wilderness all by her lonesome. We spent ages lookin' for her family, but now I s'pose were all each other has.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_054<tab>この子は、幼い頃に群れからはぐれてしまったようでのう……
ひとりでいたところを、私が保護したんじゃ。
大人しい女の子でな、「ピティー」と名付けたのじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_055<tab>Peatie? A lovely name, to be sure. And those flowers, are they peach blossoms? Ah, she looks the very symbol of Little Ladies' Day!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_055<tab>ほほう、ピティーさんとおっしゃるのですか！
この可愛らしい桃の花に彩られた姿……
プリンセスデーにぴったりですな！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_056<tab>Haha, I'm glad to hear that, and I know Peatie is, too. She's thought of little else since the moment Miss Aliapoh came to us with her peculiar request.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_056<tab>はっはっは、それは良かった。
ピティーも、この祝祭を楽しみにしておったからな、
似合うと言ってもろうて嬉しいじゃろう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_057<tab>There's nothin' in this world we love more than hearin' an audience cheer, and I think this time we've earned that and then some. We call this one “What's in the egg?” Go on, Peatie!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_057<tab>芸人の私とともにいたからか、人を喜ばせることが大好きでのう。
今回も、エッグハントにお呼ばれしたからと張り切って、
「エッグミラージュ」という新しい芸を覚えたんじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_058<tab>It...changed!
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_058<tab>なんと、これはお見事……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_059<tab>Impressive, ain't it? Usin' nothin' but a glamour prism, we change one of these ornate eggs into a cuddly little rabbit. Seems a fittin' show for the season.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_059<tab>ミラージュプリズムの応用じゃ。
飾りたまごにウサギという、
エッグハントの要素をふんだんに詰め込んでのう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_061<tab>And while our materials are simple, this idea only came to us after days and nights of wrackin' our brains. Wasn't easy to capture the spirit of <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> celebrations.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_061<tab>ものになるまで、なかなか大変じゃったが……
見た目はプリンセスデー、芸はエッグハント。
合同祝祭にも、ぴったりなものに仕上がったじゃろう？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_062<tab>Now here comes the rub. Ever since we arrived in Gridania, Peatie's been a little on edge. Hate to see her like this, but I think I've figured out what's causin' it.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_062<tab>じゃが、少し問題が起きてな。
もともと大人しい子ではあったが……
ここにきて、どうも緊張してしまっているようなんじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_063<tab>As you just saw, she's got no problem performin' in front of a crowd of two. But when a whole gaggle of revelers showed up not too long ago, she just froze up.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_063<tab>今のように、少人数が相手なら平気なんじゃが、
集まった森都の人々を前にすると、緊張に耐えられんようでな。
うまく芸ができなくなってしもうて……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_064<tab>I see... She must not be used to such large crowds.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_064<tab>ふむ……大勢の人に囲まれると緊張してしまうんですな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_065<tab>Luckily I managed to save the show by climbin' atop her head. That set her mind at ease, and finally she was able to tell rabbit from egg.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_065<tab>こういうとき、よく私が頭に乗ってやったもんじゃ。
というのも、ピティーは頭に人を乗せていると安心するんじゃよ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_100_065<tab>But I ain't as young as I used to be, and my knees aren't up to the task of climbin' her more than once in a blue moon.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_100_065<tab>しかし、最近は腰がつらくてのう……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_066<tab>But you, on the other hand...I reckon you've got plenty of malms left in those adventurer's legs of yours. Might I trouble you to join our merry troupe and support Peatie durin' her star turn?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_066<tab>冒険者殿なら、バランスを崩すこともなさそうじゃな……
すまんが、あなたが乗ってみてはくれんかのう？
そうすれば、この子も安心できるかもしれん。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_067<tab>All you have to do is climb atop her and head toward the crowds. Do our “What's in the egg?” act, and tell the spectators to come to me for an egg of their own. Still plenty to go around.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_067<tab>ピティーに乗って、集まった人々の元へ向かい、
芸を披露して、たまごの配布のことを広めてきてほしいんじゃ。
私はここで、飾りたまごを配っているからな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_070<tab>If Peatie's act is a hit in Gridania, then I see no reason why anyone would object to having her in Ul'dah. Best of luck, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_070<tab>ピティーさんがグリダニアで祝祭を盛り上げたとなれば、
ウルダハの人々も安心できる、良いきっかけとなるでしょう！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_071<tab>Grrr! Grooo!
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_071<tab>グゥ、グゥー！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Peatie is eager to get her show on the road. Speak with Aldemund to ride her.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>ピティーはやる気に満ちているようだ！
アルデムンドに話しかけて、ピティーに乗せてもらおう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_075<tab>Trust me, Peatie'll love havin' you aboard. Now's our chance to let everyone know that there's enough eggs for everyone.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_075<tab>冒険者さんが頭に乗っていれば、この子も大丈夫じゃろう。
ぜひ飾りたまごをもらってくれそうな人々に、
「エッグミラージュ」を披露してきておくれ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_076<tab>She's too timid to wander off on her own, so if somethin' else demands your attention, I reckon she'll make her way back to me. Now get out there, and show Gridania what's in the egg!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_076<tab>降りてしまったら、この子は私のところに戻ってくるじゃろう。
そのときは、冒険者殿もここまで戻ってきてくれんか。
すまんが頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_080<tab>It's...a rabbit!?
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_080<tab>わっ、なんだ！？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_081<tab>Ah, I heard tell of a performing goobbue! Good show, good show! What's in the egg, indeed! Well, I suppose I should get an egg of my own.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_081<tab>なるほど、これが噂のグゥーブーの芸か！
すごいなあ、華やかで祝祭にぴったりじゃないか……
僕も飾りたまご、もらいに行こうかな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_082<tab>They said the show was over here, didn't they?
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_082<tab>こっちで、芸が見られるって聞いたんだが……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Ride upon Peatie show the audience “What's in the egg?” to spread the cheer of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide across Gridania.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>アルデムンドが飾りたまごを配っていることを伝えるため、
ピティーに騎乗して、「エッグミラージュ」を披露しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_084<tab>That was amazing! A rabbit from an egg? Who would ever think of that!?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_084<tab>すごいすごーい！
ウサギさんかわいい、たまごもいっぱい！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_085<tab>And that crown of peach blossoms is so pretty! Do I get one if I go get an egg? I guess I should find out!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_085<tab>その花冠は桃のお花？
きれいだなあ～！
祝祭って楽しいね、私もたまごもらいに行こうっと！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_086<tab>I don't see any eggs... Is this the right place?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_086<tab>ええっと、たまごたまご……
うーん、見つからないなあ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>Ride upon Peatie show the audience “What's in the egg?” to spread the cheer of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide across Gridania.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>アルデムンドが飾りたまごを配っていることを伝えるため、
ピティーに騎乗して、「エッグミラージュ」を披露しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_088<tab>Oh my stars! What manner of foul─
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_088<tab>うわあああ！　びっくりした！
なにごと！？

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_089<tab>Oh... “Hatching<var 1F /var>tide,” you say? Yes, yes...I knew that, of course.
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_089<tab>ああ、飾りたまごの宣伝か、びっくりした……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_090<tab>Splendid trick that was, truly. I knew goobbues to be quite adept at eating eggs, but this is something else entirely. I believe you've inspired me to get an egg of my very own, in fact.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_090<tab>………………ごほん。
せ、せっかくだし、俺もエッグハントに参加してくるかな。
グゥーブーの芸っていう、珍しいものも見せてもらったしね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_091<tab>So this is Hatching<var 1F /var>tide? Hmm... Perhaps things are more lively at Bentbranch Meadows.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_091<tab>エッグハントか……
今回は、ベントブランチ牧場も会場になっているんだな。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>Ride upon Peatie show the audience “What's in the egg?” to spread the cheer of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide across Gridania.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>アルデムンドが飾りたまごを配っていることを伝えるため、
ピティーに騎乗して、「エッグミラージュ」を披露しよう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>The spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is alive in Gridania. Return to Aldemund and tell him of Peatie's courageous performances.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>芸を披露して、飾りたまごの宣伝ができた。
「アルデムンド」のところに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_094<tab>Ah, there you are. Peatie's just itchin' to show her stuff to Gridania's citizens, so hop on her back whenever you're ready.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_094<tab>おお、冒険者殿、ピティーも戻ってきておるぞ。
それでは、もう一度乗ってあげておくれ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_095<tab>This just might work...
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_095<tab>ふうむ、この様子なら……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_096<tab>Groooaaah...
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_096<tab>グゥ～♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_097<tab>While Peatie's expression is inscrutable, you sense gratitude radiating from her. It seems she considers the show a great success.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_097<tab>ピティーから感謝の気持ちが伝わってくる。
どうやら、芸の披露が楽しかったようだ。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_100<tab>Good work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Same goes for you, Peatie! I could hardly pass around the eggs fast enough!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_100<tab>おつかれさまじゃのう。
こちらは大盛況じゃったぞ！
飾りたまごもすべて配り終えたわい。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_100_100<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_100_100<tab>グゥ～！

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_101<tab>And it looks like Peatie's managed to conquer whatever fear was holdin' her back before. I reckon this'll be enough to win us entrance to Ul'dah, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_101<tab>この子も安心しきっていたようで、本当に助かったぞ。
執事王殿にも、認めてもらえているといいんじゃが……。

source: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_017<tab>
target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_017<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
